title.rendered: Immudox 30 Dissolvable Tablets Cough, Cold, Flu and Respiratory care

content.rendered:
• A carefully crafted Ayurvedic solution for effective relief from cough, cold, and respiratory discomfort. It is designed to strengthen the immune system.

Key Benefits:

  • Made with a blend of traditional Ayurvedic herbs known for their respiratory health benefits.
  • Helps the body defend against recurrent respiratory infections.
  • May provide natural relief from cough and cold.
  • Supports overall respiratory health and immune system function.
  • It not only addresses the symptoms but also promotes long-term health and wellness.

Direction of use: Place one tablet of IMMUDOX into a cup. Add very hot water, stir. Add milk, to taste if desired.

Ingredients: Yastimadhu (Licorice) powder, Lemongrass powder, Adulasa leaves powder, Kantakan powder, Tulsi leaves powder, Bharangi powder, Mint powder, Jatiphala (Nutmeg) powder, , Sunthee (Ginger) powder, Elachi (Cardamom) powder, Badi Elaichi powder (Black Cardamom), Dalchini (Cinnamon) powder, Lavang (Clove) powder.

Legal Disclaimer: This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or  prevent any disease.
